title: DRP Area shall also mean any area declared as such by the SRA though preferably fulfilling conditions laid down in section 4 of the Slum Act to qualify as slum area and/or required for implementation of (DRP)
clause_text: DRP Area shall also mean any area declared as such by the SRA though preferably fulfilling conditions laid down in section 4 of the Slum Act to qualify as slum area and/or required for implementation of (DRP). Any area where a scheme under DRP within DNA has been approved byOfficer on Special Duty (OSD),DRP (SRA)shall be a deemed DRP Area.
section: Definition of Slum, Pavement, Structure of hut, planning sectors and related terms:

source_pdf.text_snippet: DRP Area shall also mean any area declared as such by the SRA though preferably fulfilling conditions laid down in section 4 of the Slum Act to qualify as slum area and/or required for implementation
